entry.title: THE ARC B580 IS ACTUALLY GREAT & AFFORDABLE

media:group.media:title: THE ARC B580 IS ACTUALLY GREAT & AFFORDABLE
media:group.media:description:
Check out Ridge’s holiday sale at https://www.ridge.com/LINUS
Trade in your old GPU or CPU to Jawa at https://jawa.link/LTTTRADEUP and use code TRADEUP10 to get an additional $10 to your offer until the end of the year!
After launches ranging from whelming (RX 7600) to insulting (RTX 4060), we finally have a good budget contender: The Intel Arc B580. This Battlemage GPU brings impressive performance at a price that is better than any other video card out there right now. Better than the 4060 Ti, the 6700 XT, and pretty much any other card. Intel and their Xe2 architecture have impressed.
Buy an Intel Arc B580 Graphics Card: ﻿https://geni.us/66zSIB ﻿Buy an AMD RX7700 XT Graphics Card: ﻿https://geni.us/Fs7Oh ﻿Buy an NVIDIA GeForce RX 4060 Graphics Card: ﻿https://geni.us/TZ2C
Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.

entry.title: I Rented an AirBnB to Look for Hidden Cameras

media:group.media:title: I Rented an AirBnB to Look for Hidden Cameras
media:group.media:description:
Try Rocket Money for free: https://RocketMoney.com/ltt (US Residents Only) #rocketmoney #personalfinance
Check out the MSI MAG CORELIQUID I360 at https://lmg.gg/gtAmn
Ever been concerned there might be a hidden camera or mic in your AirBNB? Well we got the tool spy agencies use to make sure they’re not getting spied on themselves - a Non-Linear Junction Detector.
Articles on how to find hidden cameras: https://www.cnet.com/home/security/quick-steps-for-spotting-hidden-cameras-in-your-airbnb/ https://www.washingtonpost.com/travel/2024/05/22/hidden-cameras-airnbnb-rental-properties/

media:group.media:description:
Get a free 15-day trial of Odoo’s all-in-one business solution and see how it can make your life easier! Check it out at https://www.odoo.com/r/5eLS
Apples M4 Mac Mini on paper seems to be too good of a deal, but are they hiding anything? We build a $600 Gaming PC and a $600 Mini PC to compare in some benchmarks, and sure enough there is some truth to this Mac Mini being a power house, but by just how much?

entry.title: Don't fall for this Power Saving Scam!

media:group.media:title: Don't fall for this Power Saving Scam!
media:group.media:description:
Seasonic makes some great, energy efficient power supplies. Check out their Vertex lineup at: https://lmg.gg/TQVT1K
Have you seen these miracle ‘energy saver' devices advertised online and dismissed them as a scam? The way they’re advertised certainly seems sketchy. Believe it or not, the theory behind them is sound! They’re still totally a scam though.

media:group.media:description:

Thanks to MANSCAPED for sponsoring today's video. Get 20% Off + Free International Shipping with promo code LTT20 or visit http://manscaped.com/LTT20
